text: Pattalam Janaki is a 1977 Indian Malayalam-language film, directed by Crossbelt Mani. The film stars Unnimary, Ravikumar, Sudheer and Vijayalalitha. The film has musical score by K. J. Joy. ==Cast== *Unnimary *Ravikumar *Jayan *Sudheer *Vijayalalitha *Vincent ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by K. J. Joy with lyrics by Mankombu Gopalakrishnan and Bharanikkavu Sivakumar. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! No. !! Song !! Singers !! Lyrics !!
